for i in range(t):
 n=int(input())

import math
t=int(input())
while(t>0):
 n=int(input())
 maxProfit=-1
 for i in range(n):
  val=str(input()).split(" ")
  profit=math.floor(int(val[1])/(int(val[0])+1))*int(val[2])
  if profit>maxProfit:
   maxProfit=profit
 print(maxProfit)
 t-=1

import math
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
 n = int(input())
 maxi = 0
 for i in range(n):
  s,p,v = map(int, input().split())
  h = math.floor(p/(s+1))
  profit = h*v
  maxi = max(maxi, profit)
 print(maxi)

t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
 n = int(input())
 
 maxi = 0
 for i in range(n):
  s, p, v = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
  
  temp = p//(s+1)
  temp = temp*v
  if(maxi < temp):
   maxi = temp
 
 print(maxi)

t=int(input())
while(t>0):
 t-=1
 v1=[]
 v1.clear()
 n=int(input())
 a=0
 b=0
 while(n>0):
  n-=1
  s,p,v=map(int,input().split())

  if(p%(s+1)==0):
   ##b=0
   a=p//(s+1)
   a=a*v
   v1.append(a)
  else:
   b=p//(s+1)
   b=b*v
   v1.append(b)
 print(max(v1))

while t>0:
 t-=1

from math import gcd
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
 n = int(input())
 rev = 0
 for _ in range(n):
  si, pi, vi = map(int, input().split())
  rev = max(pi // (si + 1) * vi, rev)
 print(rev)
